reviews.review: Fun, but skill gap is imense.
Şu hileleri artık engelleyin ve de rank sistemini düzeltin.

Honestly, I think CS:GO will always be my favorite FPS, after Halo, of course.  It's a masterpiece of online gaming.  The only downfall is that there is a large amount of cheating.  I think if you need to cheat to play a video game, then you really need to work on your self-esteem and things outside of your computer.  You will never actually get any better at anything in life if you're willing to stoop to cheating- it means you've accepted that you'll never get any better, and no one should ever get to that point (you're better than that, and you WILL get better- but you won't if you take the easy way out).  You never ACTUALLY win because you'll always know that you didn't actually put in the work and that the teammate that didn't cheat should have been high on that list than you, but you stole that from them because you needed some type of boost to your self-esteem- which means you'll never actually good enough for MLG because you didn't work to get there and can't cheat in MLG.  Put in the work and be AWESOME- but it will NOT be instant.  You DO have to work for it.

Sorry I just needed to put that out there.  You're better than cheating.  Don't give up.  Nothing good in life comes easy (except making a PB&J.  It gets a pass.  PB&J ALWAYS gets a pass).
